steps.title: Discovery
steps.description: We discuss your research, goals, and vision for your online presence.

steps.title: Design
steps.description: Our team creates a stunning, custom design tailored to your field and style.

steps.title: Development
steps.description: We build your website with modern technology, ensuring speed and reliability.

steps.title: Launch
steps.description: Your website goes live, and we provide training and ongoing support.
